briefTitle: Investigation of Urinary Biomarkers for the Detection of Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Investigation of Urinary Biomarkers for the Detection of Breast Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Detection (presence/absence) of specific urinary biomarker targets (HER2, PIK3CA) for breast cancer patients measured using ddPCR.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Being at least 18 years old
* Being able to understand and read Dutch
* For cancer patients: diagnosed with breast cancer

Exclusion Criteria:

* For cancer patients: suffering from a blood cancer
* For healthy volunteers: diagnosed with cancer
